name: Salacious Crumb
Lore: 'Male Kowakian. Prankster. Humiliates others for Jabba''s amusement. His life depends on making Jabba laugh at least once per day.',
Text: 'Opponent may initiate battle at same site for free. At same or adjacent site, whenever an opponent draws a card for battle destiny, if it is: Even, opponent must use 1 Force (if possible); Odd, destiny card is lost. (AH-hahahahaha!)',
